name: Meow (XVladXGames)
description:
Meow as much as you want!

Release 1.0.0 :

01.03.2023

Release 1.1.0 :

02.03.2023

Added :

- Button "Save"

- Button "Load"

Interaction :

By clicking on the "Save" button, you save your game progress.

By clicking on the "Load" button, you load your saved game progress.
